sentence: The image is a screenshot of the "Viet Nam News" homepage, dated Monday, 7 September 2015.
sentence_cn: 图片是《越南新闻》首页的截图，日期为2015年9月7日星期一。

sentence: - Header: The top section includes the logo "Viet Nam News" with the tagline "The National English Language Daily."
sentence_cn: - 标题：顶部部分包括徽标“越南新闻”和标语“国家英语日报”。

sentence: Navigation links ("News," "bizhub.vn," "Travel," "Opinion") and options like "Site Map," "About Us," and "Contact Us" are present.
sentence_cn: 有导航链接（“新闻”、“bizhub.vn”、“旅游”、“观点”）和“网站地图”、“关于我们”和“联系我们”等选项。

sentence: - A central photograph of children in school uniforms holding Vietnamese flags, associated with an article titled "School year starts with fanfare," discussing the start of the new academic year.
sentence_cn: - 中心照片为身穿校服、手持越南国旗的孩子们，附有一篇题为“新学年在欢呼声中开始”的文章，该文章讨论了新学年的开始。

sentence: - Below the main photo, sections labeled "Politics & Laws" and "Society" are visible, each with headlines related to current events.
sentence_cn: - 在主照片下方，可以看到标有“政治与法律”和“社会”的部分，每个部分都包含与时事相关的标题。

sentence: - On the right, there's a section titled "Latest" with a list of news headlines, and a "Most Read" section.
sentence_cn: - 右侧有一个名为“最新”的部分，其中列出了新闻标题，还有“阅读最多”的部分。

sentence: - A "Your Say" section asks for reader input on living costs.
sentence_cn: - “您的意见”部分要求读者提供有关生活成本的意见。

sentence: - An "E-Paper" section provides links to the digital edition of the newspaper.
sentence_cn: - “电子报”部分提供该报纸数字版的链接。

sentence: - Advertisement: An ad banner at the top promotes a medical equipment event.
sentence_cn: - 广告：顶部的广告横幅宣传医疗设备活动。

sentence: The layout is typical of a news website, with a focus on current events and reader engagement.
sentence_cn: 该布局是典型的新闻网站，重点关注时事和读者参与度。
